document.full_text: pierre dukan has been called the dr. atkins of france, and the original dukan diet book sold 3.5 million copies in french and has been translated into 14 languages. but most americans have never heard of him.
document.title: the french diet you've never heard of
lines_and_colors: pierre dukan has been called the dr. atkins of france, and the original dukan diet book sold 3.5 million copies in french and has been translated into 14 languages. but most americans have never heard of him.
